attributes.action: Stop companies from selling electronic goods with standby modes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Almost everything you buy today from a computer to a video recorder, DVD player, has a stand by mode which just drains electricity day in day out when it is doing absolutely nothing.  Some popular satellite set top boxes even have a red light to tell you that they are off.

This is an utter waste of Energy and producer of carbon emissions.  Manufacturers are aware of the problem but in the competitive climate no one will be the first to do it.

Only the government can act to put a stop to this.

The off button should mean off.  There should be absolutely no electricity used when the appliance is off.

Some things may need a timer in which case they should use a small rechargeable battery but having a standby mode simply for the sake of allowing you to switch the TV on by remote control in inexcusable.

This practice should be outlawed immediately.
